genetic

Class HillClimber

  • java.lang.Object
    • genetic.HillClimber

  • public class HillClimber
extends java.lang.Object
    A hill-climbing algorithm that generates one individual and repeatedly tries to improve it with a random mutation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String best
      The current best individual.
      private FitnessFunction problem
      The problem being solved.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      java.lang.String getBest()
      Returns the current best individual.
      void step()
      Generates a mutated version of the current best individual.

        The current best individual.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HillClimber

        public HillClimber(FitnessFunction problem,
           int length)
        Parameters:
        problem - The problem being solved.
        length - The length of each individual.

    • Method Detail

      • getBest

        public java.lang.String getBest()
        Returns the current best individual.

      • step

        public void step()
        Generates a mutated version of the current best individual. If the mutant is better, replaces the best individual with the mutant.
